title: Print, "Design for a Canopy Bed in the Turkish Style with Alternate Suggestion in the Italian Style", ca. 1765
inscribed: Inscribed at bottom under image of bed:  Lit de Face à la Turc et à l'Italienne à deux/Representations diferentes de Moitié Liard Fecit/se vend à Paris chez Liard dessinateur, Rue Jocquelet quartier mont martre chez un Perruquier.  Avec Privilege du Roy.
provenance: From the collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: A hybrid bed designed in "Turkish" style on the left half and in "Italian" style on the right half.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for a Canopy Bed in the Turkish Style with Alternate Suggestion in the Italian Style", ca. 1765.
ca. 1765. Etching on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-84.
